text:
Just to follow up on this one. HS actually replied back that it was _not_ the intended behaviour and that they have fixed it.

Thanks for taking the time to respond
No problem! Did they give any more details or they just said the problem you saw was fixed?
<@U03BS41RWN7> did the callback above work for you?
We had to change some things since it was a few answers that were Disqualified, but its working now, thanks <@UKJSMBW6A>!
Yeah, thats what we did, super helpful, thanks!
does anyone have exit intent script for mobile?

detect scroll down, then a scroll up for a little bit.. then they go for back button?

Probably look at the the combo of scrolling down then up a certain percentage
